comments:
I was hacking some java source file and the last thing I remember was that I hit
Ctrl+Enter on a line with an error (missing ";").

Then, a dialog came up: "The command for the key you pressed failed."
At this point, the log began to fill with the NPEs below. After closing the
dialog, the java editor did not repaint any more.

I forgot: build 200406110010.
I could not reproduce it after closing the editor an opening it again.

I am not sure if this is related, but what I encountered is really bad (using
Build id: 200406110010 on Windows XP). I was modifying a junit-plugin project. I
added an import using the quick fix, and everything stopped working. Eclipse was
not redrawing and I could not click anywhere (see attached picture). I had to
kill it and restart. Here is the entire stack:
